Question
========

The value of MS(Within groups) in this ANOVA is equal to

----------

* 3.24
* 3.51
* 5.92
* 42.13

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.24: Incorrect
* 3.51: Correct
* 5.92: Incorrect
* 42.13: Incorrect
